6// BlobCache: Stores keyed blobs in memory to support EGL_ANDROID_blob_cache.
7// Can be used in conjunction with the platform layer to warm up the cache from
8// disk. MemoryProgramCache uses this to handle caching of compiled programs.
9
10#include "libANGLE/BlobCache.h"
11#include "common/utilities.h"
12#include "libANGLE/Context.h"
13#include "libANGLE/Display.h"
14#include "libANGLE/histogram_macros.h"
15#include "platform/PlatformMethods.h"
16
17namespace egl
18{
19
20namespace
21{
22enum CacheResult
23{
24 kCacheMiss,
25 kCacheHitMemory,
26 kCacheHitDisk,
27 kCacheResultMax,
28};
29
30} // anonymous namespace
31
32BlobCache::BlobCache(size_t maxCacheSizeBytes)
33 : mBlobCache(maxCacheSizeBytes), mSetBlobFunc(nullptr), mGetBlobFunc(nullptr)
34{}
35
36BlobCache::~BlobCache() {}
37
38void BlobCache::put(const BlobCache::Key &key, angle::MemoryBuffer &&value)
39{
40 if (areBlobCacheFuncsSet())
41 {
42 // Store the result in the application's cache
43 mSetBlobFunc(key.data(), key.size(), value.data(), value.size());
44 }
45 else
46 {
47 populate(key, std::move(value), CacheSource::Memory);
48 }
49}
50
51void BlobCache::putApplication(const BlobCache::Key &key, const angle::MemoryBuffer &value)
52{
53 if (areBlobCacheFuncsSet())
54 {
55 mSetBlobFunc(key.data(), key.size(), value.data(), value.size());
56 }
57}
58
59void BlobCache::populate(const BlobCache::Key &key, angle::MemoryBuffer &&value, CacheSource source)
60{
61 CacheEntry newEntry;
62 newEntry.first = std::move(value);
63 newEntry.second = source;
64
65 // Cache it inside blob cache only if caching inside the application is not possible.
66 mBlobCache.put(key, std::move(newEntry), newEntry.first.size());
67}
68
69bool BlobCache::get(angle::ScratchBuffer *scratchBuffer,
70 const BlobCache::Key &key,
71 BlobCache::Value *valueOut,
72 size_t *bufferSizeOut)
73{
74 // Look into the application's cache, if there is such a cache
75 if (areBlobCacheFuncsSet())
76 {
77 EGLsizeiANDROID valueSize = mGetBlobFunc(key.data(), key.size(), nullptr, 0);
78 if (valueSize <= 0)
79 {
80 return false;
81 }
82
83 angle::MemoryBuffer *scratchMemory;
84 bool result = scratchBuffer->get(valueSize, &scratchMemory);
85 if (!result)
86 {
87 ERR() << "Failed to allocate memory for binary blob";
88 return false;
89 }
90
91 EGLsizeiANDROID originalValueSize = valueSize;
92 valueSize = mGetBlobFunc(key.data(), key.size(), scratchMemory->data(), valueSize);
93
94 // Make sure the key/value pair still exists/is unchanged after the second call
95 // (modifications to the application cache by another thread are a possibility)
96 if (valueSize != originalValueSize)
97 {
98 // This warning serves to find issues with the application cache, none of which are
99 // currently known to be thread-safe. If such a use ever arises, this WARN can be
100 // removed.
101 WARN() << "Binary blob no longer available in cache (removed by a thread?)";
102 return false;
103 }
104
105 *valueOut = BlobCache::Value(scratchMemory->data(), scratchMemory->size());
106 *bufferSizeOut = valueSize;
107 return true;
108 }
109
110 // Otherwise we are doing caching internally, so try to find it there
111 const CacheEntry *entry;
112 bool result = mBlobCache.get(key, &entry);
113
114 if (result)
115 {
116 if (entry->second == CacheSource::Memory)
117 {
118 ANGLE_HISTOGRAM_ENUMERATION("GPU.ANGLE.ProgramCache.CacheResult", kCacheHitMemory,
119 kCacheResultMax);
120 }
121 else
122 {
123 ANGLE_HISTOGRAM_ENUMERATION("GPU.ANGLE.ProgramCache.CacheResult", kCacheHitDisk,
124 kCacheResultMax);
125 }
126
127 *valueOut = BlobCache::Value(entry->first.data(), entry->first.size());
128 *bufferSizeOut = entry->first.size();
129 }
130 else
131 {
132 ANGLE_HISTOGRAM_ENUMERATION("GPU.ANGLE.ProgramCache.CacheResult", kCacheMiss,
133 kCacheResultMax);
134 }
135
136 return result;
137}
138
139bool BlobCache::getAt(size_t index, const BlobCache::Key **keyOut, BlobCache::Value *valueOut)
140{
141 const CacheEntry *valueBuf;
142 bool result = mBlobCache.getAt(index, keyOut, &valueBuf);
143 if (result)
144 {
145 *valueOut = BlobCache::Value(valueBuf->first.data(), valueBuf->first.size());
146 }
147 return result;
148}
149
150void BlobCache::remove(const BlobCache::Key &key)
151{
152 mBlobCache.eraseByKey(key);
153}
154
155void BlobCache::setBlobCacheFuncs(EGLSetBlobFuncANDROID set, EGLGetBlobFuncANDROID get)
156{
157 mSetBlobFunc = set;
158 mGetBlobFunc = get;
159}
160
161bool BlobCache::areBlobCacheFuncsSet() const
162{
163 // Either none or both of the callbacks should be set.
164 ASSERT((mSetBlobFunc != nullptr) == (mGetBlobFunc != nullptr));
165
166 return mSetBlobFunc != nullptr && mGetBlobFunc != nullptr;
167}
168
169} // namespace egl
